name: Wubbles
description:
Wubbles (Word bubbles) is a fun word-finder game for Windows where you race the clock to find as many words as you can in a randomly generated grid and score points for the words you find.  But watch out, incorrect words will reduce your score!

Wubbles is a bit like boggle but with added twists - pieces move as you remove words and you can shuffle and flip pieces. 

Select pieces to form words by left mouse clicking on them in word order. Pieces must be touching.  Minimum word length is 3 letters. Then submit your word by right clicking.

A selected piece can be unseleccted by left clicking it again. Or clear all selected pieces by clicking the middle mouse button.

A piece can be flipped to a random letter by rolling the scroll wheel forwards or pressing "F" when hovering over the piece.

All the pieces can be shuffled by rolling the scroll wheel backwards or pressing "S".

Use flips and shuffles sparingly, you only start with 3 of each, but can earn more as your score increase.

Letters are scored like scabble, but the the total is multipied by the word length - so longer words are worth finding!

Your highscore is saved - you find that it will increase dramatically as you practise!

Thanks to Fergus Griggs for the artwork for the pieces!
